scripts.prepare: trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; bun sync & bun prepare:self & wait
scripts.sync: trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; (cd service && bun sync) & (cd web && bun sync) & wait
scripts.:dev: trap 'kill 0' EXIT; (cd web; bun run dev) & (cd service; bun run dev) & wait
scripts.check:type: (cd web && bun check:type) && (cd service && bun check:type) && (cd share && bun run check:type)
scripts.db: cd service; rm ../local.db; DATABASE_URL=file:../local.db bun db push --force
scripts.build: (cd service && bun run build) && (cd web && bun run build)
